how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: I am Ada's Dad and she is just 8 months. I am building this pool for my daughter Ada, patiently waiting for the day that she can run this stake pool by herself and be an everyday user of Cardano Ecosystem
